description: For guys who ride waves but also make them - Betawave is the first ever board short equipped with the BallPark Pouch. Featuring a fixed waist shell, they've integrated an ultra-light mesh liner, maximizing ommi-directional movement and chafe-free support. Designed using 4-wawy stretch fabric, Betawave is all about finding that flow state, providing increased comfort, security and support. Whether it's big waves or bold moves, beach bash or bar, this 2-N-1 board short wants you to send it no matter what.
name: Saxx Underwear Betawave 2n1 Boardie, 17" Outseam - Mens
